original_title: Los muchachos de antes no usaban gomina
overview: A Young man from a wealthy family hide them his attraction for tango culture of arrabal. In a milonga he fell in love with Mirella  and he have a knife fight with all others guapos that want her, he won. Time pass and Mirella became a mistress but this situation is unstable because of the society prejudices.
title: Los muchachos de antes no usaban gomina
